item.title: 2.2 Hardware
item.description: State/Version: 20230829p1 2.2 Hardware 2.2 Baseline 2.2.0 Homelab Tier Ratings 2.2.1 Computing node 2.2.2 Managed Switch 2.2.3 Router 2.2.4 Raspberry Pi 2.2 Hardware 2.2 Baseline 2.2.0 Homelab Tier Ratings Tier 0: A completely fault-tolerant hardware with redundancy for every component. Is crucial for the project. IaaC (Infrastructure as a Code) (if capable). Is part of the backup conzept. Tier 1: Is crucial for the project.
